column2: Ugh, my eyes are killing me! Maybe I’ve been working too hard... But I can’t stop until I’ve...
Oh! You there! Your timing is perfect!
If you have any extra eye drops you can spare, I could really use some right now.
Ugh... Everything’s so blurry I can barely see...
Oh, thank you! That’s much better. Now I can get on with my work!
Make sure that you take a break now and then too, okay?
